item.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18702)
item.content:encoded:

Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=BLM5280&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Colorado Attorneys Against Police Violenceour friends at Colorado Criminal Defense Bar are championing a bill to make...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Colorado Attorneys Against Police Violence

our friends at Colorado Criminal Defense Bar are championing a bill to make important changes to colorado's felony murder law, which will be heard in senate jud...iciary committee THIS THURSDAY.

contact your senator and tell them to SUPPORT sb 21-124! let them know that this is an issue that is important to our community and that no one deserves to be in prison forever for a murder they didn't commit!

find your senator here: https://leg.colorado.gov/find-my-legislator

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Katie Kelly#BOULDER, we need to gather our people. This time, they've wandered all the way to the state capitol to...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Katie Kelly

#BOULDER, we need to gather our people. This time, they've wandered all the way to the state capitol to oppose jail depopulation and ending wealth-based detenti...on. Yes, Boulder people -- including our police chief -- are writing and organizing and pressuring lawmakers NOT to pass a bill rooted in equity in policing and detention.

*Skeletor voice* STOP THEM

>>> Please write to council and be the opposing force that balances out the fear-filled pressure from Boulder's leaders on this issue: council@bouldercolorado.gov
<<<

Here are some talking points you can work with:
- Why are city leaders opposing the jail depopulation bill at the statehouse?
- Jail depopulation does NOT correlate with increased crime - counties who depopulated saw both increases AND decreases in crime
- Boulder will not be more safe by caging people who have not been convicted of a crime yet
- SB21-62 addresses wealth-based detention for people accused of low-level crimes
- Keeping people in jail pre-trial who are not dangerous wastes millions of dollars
- City leaders should stop opposing a bill that will do nothing to make Boulder safer
- Property crimes and public safety in Boulder should be addressed through city investment

✔Myths: acluco.org/SB62-FAQ
✔Fact sheet: acluco.org/SB62-Facts
✔Pre-trial death stories: acluco.org/SB62-Story

Please write!! And share this with other Boulder folks thx

See More

item.title: “This work is a full-time job,” Brown said. “It doesn’t...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“This work is a full-time job,” Brown said. “It doesn’t make headlines and it’s not glamorous. But it’s the stuff that will build community long term. Places to find employment, places to find resources, places to feel safe.”

https://www.msmayhem.com/how-blm-5280-became-more-than-has…/

With the help of co-founder Amy E. Brown, Black Lives Matter 5280 is far more than just a hashtag. They're building long-term community.

msmayhem.com

How BLM 5280 became more than just a hashtag - Ms. Mayhem

We've gathered practitioners and therapists of all backgrounds to discuss how Black women and femmes questions f...or healing is a must.

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Denzel CaldwellEven though the use of sexual violence on Black men during chattel slavery is a MUCH needed topic that...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Denzel Caldwell

Even though the use of sexual violence on Black men during chattel slavery is a MUCH needed topic that needs to be addressed, I'm definitely NOT recommending th...at Buck Breaking doc that Tariq Nasheed is making.

All it will be is:

1. A cluster of misinformation, a few historical truths, and sensational media.

2. A propaganda film that will ultimately lead our folks to double down on their homophobia instead of unpacking historic and present sexual violence on Black Men and reimagining how we address sexual violence.

3. Another reason to traumatize viewers

Instead, if folks are serious in learning about the ways we were dehumanized in hopes of creating new ways of being and healing, i would recommend "Delectable Negro by Vincent Woodard.

P.S. Even if this book is referenced in the doc, it doesn't matter. Going to the sources will always be better than looking at what those who want to profit from you want to see.

Shout out to Preston Anderson for putting me on to this text!

EDIT: S/o to Anwar Jabari Johnson and Kenneth M Pass for recommending "Rethinking Rufus: The Sexual Violation of Enslaved Men" by Thomas A Foster

Have a great day!

#ReadMyPeople

See More

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Padres & Jóvenes Unidos🗣HEAR FROM EXPERTS ABOUT DISRUPTING THE SCHOOL-TO-PRISON PIPELINE Register here:...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Padres & Jóvenes Unidos

🗣HEAR FROM EXPERTS ABOUT DISRUPTING THE SCHOOL-TO-PRISON PIPELINE

Register here: https://p2a.co/MxVyND8

Join us at Padres & Jóvenes Unidos in partnership with... Stand for Children Colorado on Wednesday, March 10 at 4:30 pm to hear from a panel of experts about the school to prison pipeline—both the problem and potential solutions.

We are leading efforts at the Capitol to advance solutions to disrupt and end the school-to-prison pipeline. We will share information about how to get involved in supporting those efforts, reserve plenty of time for questions, and spend time reflecting on what we've heard. This event will be fully bilingual in Spanish and English.

🗣ESCUCHE A LOS EXPERTOS SOBRE LA INTERRUPCIÓN DE LA VÍA DE LA ESCUELA A LA CÁRCEL

Regístrate aquí: https://p2a.co/MxVyND8

Únate a Padres y Jóvenes Unidos y Stand for Children Colorado el miércoles 10 de marzo a las 4:30 pm. Tendremos un panel de expertos discutiendo la criminalización de estudiantes y las posibles soluciones.

Padres está liderando esfuerzos en el Capitolio para avanzar en soluciones para la criminalización de estudiantes y prevenir que vayan de la escuela a la cárcel. Compartiremos información sobre cómo participar en el apoyo a esos esfuerzos, contestaremos preguntas y reflexionaremos sobre lo que hemos escuchado. Este evento será completamente bilingüe, en español e inglés.

See More
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280+5GirlTrek: Healthy Black Women and GirlsLet us always remember the time GirlTrek walked 100 miles in the literal...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280+5GirlTrek: Healthy Black Women and Girls

Let us always remember the time GirlTrek walked 100 miles in the literal footsteps of Harriet Tubman.

In March 2018, we rallied a group of Trekkers to go on a ...walking journey that started in the Eastern Shore of Maryland, where Harriet Tubman made her first escape, and went along the path she took to freedom along the Harriet Tubman Underground Railroad Byway.

It was Harriet’s Great Escape. We trekked in sun, sleet and cold weather to exemplify radical courage and unshakeable sisterhood.

Harriet Tubman saved her own life first and then went back time after time to save the lives of others giving us the blueprint for the work GirlTrek does today.

This is radical self-care at its core.

See More
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: #ToFreedom #MutualAid #Reparations
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#ToFreedom #MutualAid #Reparations

Hess Love

Today is Harriet Tubman Day, it's the anniversary of her transition into Ancestorhood. She is one of the most formidable, collectively elevated Ancestors known ...in our tradition. A visionary. Literally a visionary in the political, spiritual, and social sense. Harriet Tubman thought about the collective AND she thought about herself, remember, 𝘴𝘩𝘦 was the FIRST person that she took up north.

A spiritual thing that you can do in her honor is to send money to Black mutual aid orgs. Sharing money is sharing energy. ✨

Please list some orgs in the comments.

See More

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...

coloradogives.org
